data.event: According to Lewis A. McArthur, Malin was settled September 30, 1909, on land that was formerly at the bottom of Tule Lake by 65 Bohemian families who named the new town for their former home.

event.title: the discovery of fossils near Malin in 1925

data.event: McArthur also alludes to the discovery of fossils near Malin in 1925.
